snippet.title: Creepy Corridors - Vic 20 - Longplay - Cartridge - Real Hardware
snippet.description:
A maze game by Don McGlauflin, published by Sierra on-line in 1983.
To exit each level you need to either kill all the enemies, or collect the four diamonds, then the door will appear for you to escape.  From level 5 you will have skulls that can't be killed.  Level 5 has one skull, 5-6 have two, and 8-9 have three.
Once you finish level nine, it repeats that level.
Thanks to tokra on the Vic-20 Denial forum for the PAL fixed version.
